about_the_game:
Raaabix Le:
Welcome to the whimsical world of tower-building chaos! Gather your friends or dive into the fray with up to 8 players as you unleash your inner architect. Your goal? Craft and stack the most eye-catching blocks to create a towering masterpiece that outshines the competition!

Leap, dash, and navigate vibrant maps filled with challenges as you collect colorful bricks. But beware—the real magic lies in your combos! Unleash spectacular combinations that can propel you to victory or send your opponents flying. Just remember, some combos come with a bang!

Whether you’re teaming up with friends in private rooms or jumping into random matches around the globe, every game is a thrilling adventure. The more players, the higher the stakes—and the taller the tower!

With a playful tutorial in the whimsical block factory, 7 enchanting maps to explore, a treasure trove of over 10 unique skins to personalize your character, and 10+ special combos to master, Raaabix Le invites you to embark on a colorful journey where creativity meets competition. Ready to stack your way to glory? Let the fun begin!

Raaabix Le:

Leap, dash, and navigate vibrant maps filled with challenges as you collect colorful bricks. But beware—the real magic lies in your combos! Unleash spectacular combinations that can propel you to victory or send your opponents flying. Just remember, some combos come with a bang!

Whether you’re teaming up with friends in private rooms or jumping into random matches around the globe, every game is a thrilling adventure. The more players, the higher the stakes—and the taller the tower!

With a playful tutorial in the whimsical block factory, 7 enchanting maps to explore, a treasure trove of over 10 unique skins to personalize your character, and 10+ special combos to master, Raaabix Le invites you to embark on a colorful journey where creativity meets competition. name: Raaabix Le

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 880 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 440 or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Gamepads Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 880 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 440 or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Gamepads Recommended

short_description: Raaabix Le: Join the tower-building fun! Stack colorful blocks to create the tallest tower while outsmarting opponents. Jump, unleash combos, and watch for surprises! Play with friends or random matches across 7 maps. Customize with cool skins and build your way to victory!
